// adijimmy
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
const int mod = 1e9+7;
int Z[1000005];
int dp[1000005];
string s;
int n,k;
void solve(){
 int L = 0,R = 0;
 Z[0] = 0;
 for(int i=1;i<n;i++){
   if(i>R){
     L = R = i;
     while(R<n && s[R-L]==s[R]) R++;
     Z[i] = R-L; R--;
   }else{
     int k = i-L;
     if(Z[k]<R-i+1) Z[i] = Z[k];
     else{
		L = i;
      while(R<n && s[R-L]==s[R]) R++;
      Z[i] = R-L; R--;
     }
   }
 }
}
int main(){
	cin >> n >> s >> k;
	solve();
	dp[n] += 1;
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++) dp[Z[i]] += 1;
	ll res = 0;
	for(int i=n;i>=0;i--){
		res += dp[i];
		if(res >= k){
			cout << i << endl;
			for(int j=0;j<i;j++){
				printf("%c",s[j]);
			}
			break;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
